sen.e: Kintomi IMADEGAWA (1396 - September 5, 1421) was a kugyo (top court official) who lived in the Muromachi period.

sen.e: Because Kintomi died young with no heir, his younger brother, Norisue, inherited the line of the Imadegawa family.
